example.eg: The chair-manufacturing process is quite complex.
example.egtrans: 生产椅子的工序挺复杂的。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 工序, 加工方法, 制作方法

example.eg: There is a set process for applying for a passport.
example.egtrans: 申请护照有一套固定程序。

example.eg: You must follow the same process every time you do it.
example.egtrans: 你每次都应该按照相同的步骤进行。

example.eg: Throughout the process, he stayed loyal to his beliefs.
example.egtrans: 在这整个过程中，他都对自己的信仰保持忠心。

example.eg: The process cheese doesn't look or taste like real cheese.
The process was served by a bailiff.
This bony process is called the sacral promontory.
The royal party processed from Buckingham Palace to Westminster for the wedding.
We need to process this in a chemical solution to make it change colour.
Process the wood to make charcoal for cooking.
The immigrants were processed at the airport.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 按程序办理, 按程序处理

example.eg: This case must be processed efficiently or we might lose in court.
Each of us processes grief in our own way.
example.egtrans: 我们所有人都用自己的方式处理悲伤的情感。

dsense.name: process [sb] with [sth]
dsense.guideword: often passive (serve a summons) (法院传票)

example.eg: He was processed with a summons to appear in court by the police.
example.egtrans: 警方把法院传票送达给他。

example.eg: Since his stroke, Phil takes much longer to process words into sentences.
example.egtrans: 中风之后，菲尔要花更长的时间，才能连词为句。

dsense.name: due process, due process of law

example.eg: If arrested, you have the right to due process.
Preparations for the 2012 Olympics were in process.
example.egtrans: 2012年奥运会的准备工作正在进行中。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 正在生产, 正在制造, 正在加工

example.eg: Janine has been studying German at school, and in the process, she's made new friends.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在这个过程中, 在此过程中

example.eg: The robber tripped and broke his leg in the process of trying to flee.

dsense.name: be in the process of doing [sth]

example.eg: I am in the process of applying for a visa to travel to the USA.
The legal process to get squatters out of a property can take a long time.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 行动计划时间表，进度时间表
甄选程序，遴选程序，筛选程序
